#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,a[50],i,j,l,b[50],count;
	while(scanf("%d",&n))
	{
		if(!n)
			break;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			scanf("%d",&a[i]);
		sort(a,a+n);
		
		j=n/2-1;
		l=n-1;
		for(i=0;j>=0;)
		{
			b[i]=a[j];
			b[i+1]=a[l];
			i = i+2;
			j--;
			l--;
		}
		b[i]=a[n/2];
		count =0;
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			count += abs(b[i]-b[i-1]);
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
